Articles.Content:
BrahMos Missile

So the plan for this, is to create a BrahMos missile equivalent in KSP using BDarmoury.

I am by now means experienced in texturing, modelling or modding in any way, but I hope that using BDarmoury should allow easier setup. I hope this could encourage other people to do the same, make their own custom weapons using the mod.

Progress album

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I am open to help and suggestions: I'm largely worried about the texturing part, so any help there would be much appreciated

EDIT 30/8/14: Unwrapping nicely is hard. I'm still trying to muster enough brainpower to work 2d as well.

Edited August 30, 2014 by duckofthemoon

Hi it looks great I really hope you can finish it and that somebody else can help you. I really have no experience, but I would like to make my own rockets or something but I have now idea how to start do you maybe have some tips?
Oh god is this gonna spark another Reddit BrahMos Madness phase?

Hi it looks great I really hope you can finish it and that somebody else can help you. I really have no experience, but I would like to make my own rockets or something but I have now idea how to start do you maybe have some tips?

This is my first foray into proper 3d modelling using blender, texturing, and unity. It took me far too long to make the model, about 6 hours. I currently have a model that explodes in-game with some truly awful textures. I need to figure out the config files.

To make your own, just have a look at the BDarmoury missiles. I'm just using a config for the aim-120 as a template.

This is a godsend.

A quick tip for your imgur album in the OP, remove the "#0" from inside the tags. Having it there makes the album show up weird on the forums.

I wish you luck! It's cool to be able to say "I make mods for KSP" in real life, so work hard and do your best and you'll do just fine.

Thanks! I was wondering why that was. Must've not read the guidelines for posting imgur albums closely enough.

It does feel a little cheap to just be using BahamutoD's module, but I'll move on to greater things I hope.

This is my first foray into proper 3d modelling using blender, texturing, and unity. It took me far too long to make the model, about 6 hours. I currently have a model that explodes in-game with some truly awful textures. I need to figure out the config files.

To make your own, just have a look at the BDarmoury missiles. I'm just using a config for the aim-120 as a template.

This is a godsend.

Thank you very much.
